archeology|Projects|ArcRegistry: Full name: 'Project ID'. Explanation: Primary key for Projects, a unique project identifier. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Example: 'PR7509'.
archeology|Projects|VesselTag: Full name: 'Project Name'. Explanation: Label or name for the project. Data type: VARCHAR(60). Example: 'Project Happy'.
archeology|Projects|FundFlux: Full name: 'Funding Source'. Explanation: Source of funds for the project. Data type: TEXT. Example: 'Government'.
archeology|Projects|AuthPin: Full name: 'Permit Number'. Explanation: Authorization or permit ID. Data type: CHAR(6). Example: 'PMT4719'.
archeology|Projects|AuthHalt: Full name: 'Permit Expiry Date'. Explanation: Date on which the permit expires. Data type: DATE. Example: '2025-12-05'.
archeology|Personnel|CrewRegistry: Full name: 'Operator ID'. Explanation: Primary key for Personnel, representing an operator. Data type: CHAR(8). Example: 'OP4641'.
archeology|Personnel|CrewLabel: Full name: 'Operator Name'. Explanation: Name or label for the operator. Data type: VARCHAR(50). Example: 'Joel Wallace'.
archeology|Personnel|LeadRegistry: Full name: 'Supervisor ID'. Explanation: Identifies a supervisor. Data type: CHAR(8). Example: 'SV7658'.
archeology|Personnel|LeadLabel: Full name: 'Supervisor Name'. Explanation: Name of the supervisor. Data type: VARCHAR(40). Example: 'Michael Kaiser'.
archeology|Sites|ZoneRegistry: Full name: 'Site Code'. Explanation: Primary key for a site. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'SC9016'.
archeology|Sites|ZoneLabel: Full name: 'Site Name'. Explanation: Descriptive name or label for the site. Data type: TEXT. Example: 'Site-North Alexanderville'.
archeology|Sites|DigUnit: Full name: 'Excavation Unit'. Explanation: Designation of a specific trench or unit. Data type: VARCHAR(8). Example: 'Unit-C9'.
archeology|Sites|GridTrace: Full name: 'Grid Reference'. Explanation: Grid or coordinate notation for the site location. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'S29-E8'.
archeology|Sites|GeoX: Full name: 'Latitude'. Explanation: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees. Data type: NUMERIC(8,5). Example: -9.60213.
archeology|Sites|GeoY: Full name: 'Longitude'. Explanation: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees. Data type: NUMERIC(8,5). Example: -2.75641.
archeology|Sites|HeightM: Full name: 'Altitude (m)'. Explanation: Elevation above sea level, in meters. Data type: NUMERIC(7,1). Example: 4391.4.
archeology|Sites|DepthC: Full name: 'Depth (cm)'. Explanation: Depth measurement in centimeters. Data type: NUMERIC(7,1). Example: 329.9.
archeology|Sites|PhaseFactor: Full name: 'Cultural/Historical Period'. Explanation: Indicates the archaeological or historical phase. Data type: VARCHAR(25). Possible categories: Iron Age, Medieval, Classical, Bronze Age.
archeology|Sites|GuessDate: Full name: 'Estimated Date'. Explanation: Approximate or labeled date (BCE/CE). Data type: VARCHAR(20). Possible categories: -2929 BCE, 1335 BCE, -4985 BCE, -3387 BCE.
archeology|Sites|TypeSite: Full name: 'Site Type'. Explanation: Classification of the site. Data type: VARCHAR(25). Possible categories: Burial, Industrial, Military, Settlement, Religious.
archeology|Sites|PresStat: Full name: 'Preservation Status'. Explanation: Condition of preservation at the site. Data type: VARCHAR(25). Possible categories: Excellent, Fair, Critical, Good, Poor.
archeology|Sites|GuardHint: Full name: 'Weather Protection'. Explanation: Indicates if the site is protected from weather. Data type: CHAR(5). Possible categories: None, Temporary.
archeology|Sites|EntryStat: Full name: 'Site Access Status'. Explanation: Access restrictions or availability of the site. Data type: VARCHAR(8). Possible categories: Closed, Restricted, Open.
archeology|Sites|SafeRank: Full name: 'Security Level'. Explanation: Level of security or safety at the site. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Minimal, High, Standard.
archeology|Sites|InsurStat: Full name: 'Insurance Status'. Explanation: Whether the site is insured, pending, or expired. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Expired, Pending.
archeology|Sites|RiskEval: Full name: 'Risk Assessment Status'. Explanation: Status of risk evaluation for the site. Data type: TEXT. Possible categories: Required, Completed, Pending.
archeology|Sites|HealthEval: Full name: 'Health and Safety Status'. Explanation: Indicates health/safety approvals. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Possible categories: Approved, Review, Pending.
archeology|Sites|EnvHaz: Full name: 'Environmental Risk'. Explanation: Rating of environmental hazards. Data type: CHAR(6). Possible categories: Low, Medium, High.
archeology|Equipment|EquipRegistry: Full name: 'Equipment ID'. Explanation: Primary key for equipment. Data type: CHAR(10). Example: 'SN20065'.
archeology|Equipment|EquipForm: Full name: 'Equipment Type'. Explanation: Type or category of scanning equipment. Data type: VARCHAR(28). Possible categories: LiDAR, Structured Light, Photogrammetry, Laser.
archeology|Equipment|EquipDesign: Full name: 'Equipment Model'. Explanation: Model name or identifier. Data type: VARCHAR(14). Example: 'Model-669'.
archeology|Equipment|EquipTune: Full name: 'Calibration Date'. Explanation: Date the equipment was last calibrated. Data type: DATE. Example: '2024-11-01'.
archeology|Equipment|EquipStatus: Full name: 'Equipment Condition'. Explanation: Overall condition of the equipment. Data type: VARCHAR(16). Possible categories: Excellent, Good, Fair, Poor.
archeology|Equipment|PowerLevel: Full name: 'Battery Level (%)'. Explanation: Battery level as an integer percentage. Data type: SMALLINT. Example: 62.
archeology|Scans|QuestRegistry: Full name: 'Scan ID'. Explanation: Primary key identifying a particular scan. Data type: VARCHAR(16). Example: 'ASD409481'.
archeology|Scans|ChronoTag: Full name: 'Scan Timestamp'. Explanation: Timestamp representing the scan date/time. Data type: TIMESTAMP. If stored as a numeric like 44302.55648, it may be an Excel serial date/time (days since 1900-01-00). Example: 44302.55648.
archeology|Scans|ArcRef: Full name: 'Project Reference'. Explanation: Links a scan to a specific project. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Example: 'PR7509'.
archeology|Scans|CrewRef: Full name: 'Operator Reference'. Explanation: Records which operator performed the scan. Data type: CHAR(8). Example: 'OP4641'.
archeology|Scans|ZoneRef: Full name: 'Site Reference'. Explanation: Associates the scan with a site code. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'SC9016'.
archeology|Scans|ScanCount: Full name: 'Number of Scans'. Explanation: Numeric count of scans in a set. Data type: SMALLINT. Example: 5.
archeology|Scans|ClimTune: Full name: 'Weather Conditions'. Explanation: Indicates the weather during scanning. Data type: VARCHAR(22). Possible categories: Windy, Rainy, Cloudy, Clear.
archeology|Scans|HueCatch: Full name: 'Color Capture'. Explanation: Mode of color recording. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Possible categories: RGB, Grayscale, None.
archeology|Scans|FmtFile: Full name: 'File Format'. Explanation: Format in which scan data is saved. Data type: CHAR(4). Possible categories: PTS, PLY, OBJ, LAS, E57.
archeology|Scans|GBSize: Full name: 'File Size (GB)'. Explanation: Size of the scan file in gigabytes. Data type: NUMERIC(5,2). Example: 24.71.
archeology|Scans|PressRatio: Full name: 'Compression Ratio'. Explanation: Compression level applied to scan data. Data type: NUMERIC(4,2). Example: 3.22.
archeology|Scans|SpanMin: Full name: 'Scan Duration (min)'. Explanation: Duration of the scanning process, in minutes. Data type: NUMERIC(5,2). Example: 63.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|AirRegistry: Full name: 'Environment Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for environment data. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 1001.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|ZoneRef: Full name: 'Site Reference'. Explanation: Links environment conditions to a specific site code. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'SC9016'.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|EquipRef: Full name: 'Equipment Reference'. Explanation: Identifies which equipment these environment data refer to. Data type: CHAR(10). Example: 'SN20065'.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|AmbicTemp: Full name: 'Ambient Temperature (C)'. Explanation: Air temperature in Celsius. Data type: NUMERIC(5,2). Example: 25.3.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|HumePct: Full name: 'Relative Humidity (%)'. Explanation: Humidity as a percentage. Data type: NUMERIC(5,2). Example: 60.4.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|IllumeLux: Full name: 'Light Conditions (lux)'. Explanation: Measured illumination in lux. Data type: INTEGER. Example: 86054.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|GeoSignal: Full name: 'GPS Signal Quality'. Explanation: Quality rating for GPS reception. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: None, Poor, Good, Excellent.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|TrackStatus: Full name: 'RTK Status'. Explanation: Real-Time Kinematic correction state. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Possible categories: None, Fixed.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|LinkStatus: Full name: 'Network Status'. Explanation: Status of network connectivity. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Possible categories: Disconnected, Connected.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|PhotoMap: Full name: 'Photogrammetry Overlap'. Explanation: Percentage overlap for photogrammetry images. Data type: CHAR(4). Possible categories: 80%, 60%, 90%.
archeology|ScanEnvironment|ImgCount: Full name: 'Number of Images'. Explanation: How many images were taken for photogrammetry. Data type: SMALLINT. Example: 248.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|CloudRegistry: Full name: 'Point Cloud Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for point cloud data. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 2001.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|CrewRef: Full name: 'Operator Reference'. Explanation: Which operator is linked to this point cloud. Data type: CHAR(8). Example: 'OP4641'.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|ArcRef: Full name: 'Project Reference'. Explanation: Project ID associated with this point cloud. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Example: 'PR7509'.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|ScanResolMm: Full name: 'Scan Resolution (mm)'. Explanation: Resolution of points in millimeters. Data type: NUMERIC(5,2). Example: 2.4.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|PointDense: Full name: 'Point Density (points/m²)'. Explanation: Density of points per square meter. Data type: INTEGER. Example: 42812.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|CoverPct: Full name: 'Coverage (%)'. Explanation: Surface coverage percentage. Data type: NUMERIC(4,1). Example: 91.2.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|TotalPts: Full name: 'Total Points'. Explanation: Overall number of points in the cloud. Data type: BIGINT. Example: 46562436.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|CloudDense: Full name: 'Point-Cloud Density Code'. Explanation: A numeric code classifying point density. Data type: INTEGER. Possible categories: 9449, 431, 7553, 1746.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|LapPct: Full name: 'Overlap (%)'. Explanation: Overlap percentage among multiple scans. Data type: NUMERIC(4,1). Example: 31.3.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|NoiseDb: Full name: 'Noise Level (dB)'. Explanation: Measured noise in decibels. Data type: NUMERIC(6,3). Example: 1.318.
archeology|ScanPointCloud|RefPct: Full name: 'Surface Reflectivity (%)'. Explanation: Reflectivity percentage of scanned surfaces. Data type: NUMERIC(4,1). Example: 65.4.
archeology|ScanMesh|FacetRegistry: Full name: 'Mesh Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for mesh data. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 3001.
archeology|ScanMesh|ZoneRef: Full name: 'Site Reference'. Explanation: Associates mesh data with a site code. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'SC9016'.
archeology|ScanMesh|EquipRef: Full name: 'Equipment Reference'. Explanation: Identifies which equipment was used to generate the mesh. Data type: CHAR(10). Example: 'SN20065'.
archeology|ScanMesh|FacetVerts: Full name: 'Mesh Vertices'. Explanation: Count of mesh vertices. Data type: BIGINT. Example: 7234721.
archeology|ScanMesh|FacetFaces: Full name: 'Mesh Faces'. Explanation: Count of triangular or polygonal faces. Data type: BIGINT. Example: 5997318.
archeology|ScanMesh|FacetResMm: Full name: 'Mesh Resolution (mm)'. Explanation: Mesh vertex spacing in mm. Data type: NUMERIC(5,2). Example: 3.2.
archeology|ScanMesh|TexDist: Full name: 'Texture Resolution Setting'. Explanation: Preset texture resolution. Data type: VARCHAR(5). Possible categories: 2K, 1K, 4K.
archeology|ScanMesh|TexPix: Full name: 'Texture Size (px)'. Explanation: Texture image dimension in pixels. Data type: INTEGER. Example: 2048.
archeology|ScanMesh|UVMapQual: Full name: 'UV Mapping Quality'. Explanation: Quality of the UV mapping process. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Possible categories: Medium, High, Low.
archeology|ScanMesh|GeomDeltaMm: Full name: 'Geometric Accuracy (mm)'. Explanation: Estimated geometric deviation in millimeters. Data type: NUMERIC(6,3). Example: 2.74.
archeology|ScanSpatial|DomainRegistry: Full name: 'Spatial Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for spatial data. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 4001.
archeology|ScanSpatial|ArcRef: Full name: 'Project Reference'. Explanation: Project ID linking spatial data. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Example: 'PR7509'.
archeology|ScanSpatial|CrewRef: Full name: 'Operator Reference'. Explanation: Operator ID for these spatial records. Data type: CHAR(8). Example: 'OP4641'.
archeology|ScanSpatial|AreaM2: Full name: 'Surface Area (m²)'. Explanation: Calculated area in square meters. Data type: NUMERIC(8,3). Example: 78.01.
archeology|ScanSpatial|VolM3: Full name: 'Volume (m³)'. Explanation: Computed volume in cubic meters. Data type: NUMERIC(9,4). Example: 76.7.
archeology|ScanSpatial|BoxX: Full name: 'Bounding Box X (m)'. Explanation: Size of bounding box along X-axis, in meters. Data type: NUMERIC(8,2). Example: 40.12.
archeology|ScanSpatial|BoxY: Full name: 'Bounding Box Y (m)'. Explanation: Size of bounding box along Y-axis, in meters. Data type: NUMERIC(8,3). Example: 1.06.
archeology|ScanSpatial|BoxZ: Full name: 'Bounding Box Z (m)'. Explanation: Size of bounding box along Z-axis, in meters. Data type: NUMERIC(9,2). Example: 16.41.
archeology|ScanSpatial|AngleAz: Full name: 'Orientation (degrees)'. Explanation: Azimuth or rotation angle around vertical axis. Data type: REAL. Example: 342.4.
archeology|ScanSpatial|AngleTilt: Full name: 'Tilt Angle (degrees)'. Explanation: Inclination angle from horizontal. Data type: DOUBLE PRECISION. Example: 23.9.
archeology|ScanSpatial|GroundSpan: Full name: 'Ground Sampling Distance (mm)'. Explanation: Effective resolution on the ground, in mm. Data type: NUMERIC(6,3). Example: 4.13.
archeology|ScanFeatures|TraitRegistry: Full name: 'Feature Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for feature data. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 5001.
archeology|ScanFeatures|ZoneRef: Full name: 'Site Reference'. Explanation: Site code tied to these features. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'SC9016'.
archeology|ScanFeatures|EquipRef: Full name: 'Equipment Reference'. Explanation: Equipment ID used to detect these features. Data type: CHAR(10). Example: 'SN20065'.
archeology|ScanFeatures|TraitExtract: Full name: 'Feature Extraction Method'. Explanation: Method used to extract features (manual or automated). Data type: VARCHAR(25). Possible categories: Manual, Semi-automatic, Automatic.
archeology|ScanFeatures|TraitCount: Full name: 'Number of Detected Features'. Explanation: How many features were identified. Data type: INTEGER. Example: 516.
archeology|ScanFeatures|ArtiCount: Full name: 'Artifact Count'. Explanation: Number of artifacts recognized. Data type: INTEGER. Example: 71.
archeology|ScanFeatures|StructKind: Full name: 'Structure Type'. Explanation: Type of structural element. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Artifact, Complex, Wall, Foundation.
archeology|ScanFeatures|MatKind: Full name: 'Material Type'. Explanation: Primary composition or material. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Organic, Metal, Mixed, Ceramic, Stone.
archeology|ScanFeatures|HueStudy: Full name: 'Color Analysis'. Explanation: Status of color analysis (done or pending). Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Partial, Completed, Not Required.
archeology|ScanFeatures|TextureStudy: Full name: 'Texture Analysis'. Explanation: Status of texture analysis. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Partial, Completed, Not Required.
archeology|ScanFeatures|PatternNote: Full name: 'Pattern Recognition'. Explanation: Notes regarding detected patterns. Data type: TEXT. Possible categories: Not Required, None, Partial.
archeology|ScanConservation|CureRegistry: Full name: 'Conservation Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for conservation data. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 6001.
archeology|ScanConservation|ArcRef: Full name: 'Project Reference'. Explanation: Associates conservation data with a project. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Example: 'PR7509'.
archeology|ScanConservation|ZoneRef: Full name: 'Site Reference'. Explanation: Associates conservation data with a site code. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'SC9016'.
archeology|ScanConservation|HarmAssess: Full name: 'Damage Assessment'. Explanation: Indicates severity of damage. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: None, Moderate, Severe.
archeology|ScanConservation|CureRank: Full name: 'Conservation Priority'. Explanation: Priority level for conservation efforts. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Critical, Low, High.
archeology|ScanConservation|StructState: Full name: 'Structural Stability'. Explanation: Stability level of the structure. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Stable, Moderate, Unstable.
archeology|ScanConservation|IntervHistor: Full name: 'Intervention History'. Explanation: Past restoration or intervention records. Data type: TEXT. Possible categories: None, Major, Minor.
archeology|ScanConservation|PriorDocs: Full name: 'Previous Documentation'. Explanation: Level of existing documentation. Data type: TEXT. Possible categories: None, Partial, Complete.
archeology|ScanRegistration|LogRegistry: Full name: 'Registration Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for registration logs. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 7001.
archeology|ScanRegistration|CrewRef: Full name: 'Operator Reference'. Explanation: Operator ID who performed registration. Data type: CHAR(8). Example: 'OP4641'.
archeology|ScanRegistration|ArcRef: Full name: 'Project Reference'. Explanation: Project ID linked to registration data. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Example: 'PR7509'.
archeology|ScanRegistration|LogAccuMm: Full name: 'Registration Accuracy (mm)'. Explanation: Accuracy of the registration in mm. Data type: NUMERIC(5,3). Example: 0.84.
archeology|ScanRegistration|RefMark: Full name: 'Reference Markers'. Explanation: Numeric codes for registration targets. Data type: VARCHAR(6). Possible categories: 40, 31, 25, 21.
archeology|ScanRegistration|CtrlPts: Full name: 'Control Points'. Explanation: Numeric codes for control points. Data type: VARCHAR(6). Possible categories: 73, 99, 6, 84.
archeology|ScanRegistration|LogMethod: Full name: 'Registration Method'. Explanation: Method for aligning scans. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Target-based, Hybrid, Automatic.
archeology|ScanRegistration|TransForm: Full name: 'Transformation Matrix'. Explanation: Identifier for the transform matrix used. Data type: VARCHAR(15). Possible categories: Matrix-47, Matrix-113, Matrix-543.
archeology|ScanRegistration|ErrScale: Full name: 'Error Metrics'. Explanation: Type of error measurement. Data type: VARCHAR(20). Possible categories: Cloud-to-Mesh, Cloud-to-Cloud, RMSE.
archeology|ScanRegistration|ErrValMm: Full name: 'Error Value (mm)'. Explanation: Measured error in millimeters. Data type: NUMERIC(6,3). Example: 6.962.
archeology|ScanProcessing|FlowRegistry: Full name: 'Processing Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for processing workflow. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 8001.
archeology|ScanProcessing|EquipRef: Full name: 'Equipment Reference'. Explanation: Equipment ID used for processing. Data type: CHAR(10). Example: 'SN20065'.
archeology|ScanProcessing|ZoneRef: Full name: 'Site Reference'. Explanation: Site code for which processing applies. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Example: 'SC9016'.
archeology|ScanProcessing|FlowSoft: Full name: 'Processing Software'. Explanation: Name of the software used. Data type: VARCHAR(25). Possible categories: RealityCapture, CloudCompare, Agisoft.
archeology|ScanProcessing|FlowHrs: Full name: 'Processing Time (hours)'. Explanation: Time spent on processing. Data type: NUMERIC(5,2). Example: 21.9.
archeology|ScanProcessing|ProcCPU: Full name: 'CPU Usage (%)'. Explanation: CPU usage as an integer percentage. Data type: SMALLINT. Example: 81.
archeology|ScanProcessing|MemUsageGb: Full name: 'Memory Usage (GB)'. Explanation: RAM usage during processing. Data type: NUMERIC(6,2). Example: 70.3.
archeology|ScanProcessing|ProcGPU: Full name: 'GPU Usage (%)'. Explanation: GPU usage as an integer percentage. Data type: SMALLINT. Example: 56.
archeology|ScanProcessing|StashLoc: Full name: 'Storage Location'. Explanation: Where processed data is stored. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Possible categories: Local, Network, Cloud.
archeology|ScanProcessing|SafeBak: Full name: 'Backup Status'. Explanation: Indicates progress of data backup. Data type: CHAR(8). Possible categories: In Progress, Completed, Pending.
archeology|ScanProcessing|DataLevel: Full name: 'Data Access Level'. Explanation: Access restrictions or sharing level. Data type: TEXT. Possible categories: Confidential, Public, Restricted.
archeology|ScanProcessing|MetaBench: Full name: 'Metadata Standard'. Explanation: Which metadata framework is applied. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Possible categories: Dublin Core, CIDOC CRM, Custom.
archeology|ScanProcessing|CoordFrame: Full name: 'Coordinate System'. Explanation: Defines spatial reference frame. Data type: VARCHAR(12). Possible categories: Local, WGS84, Custom.
archeology|ScanProcessing|ElevRef: Full name: 'Elevation Reference'. Explanation: Reference for altitude or elevation. Data type: VARCHAR(16). Possible categories: Arbitrary, Sea Level, Local.
archeology|ScanProcessing|RemainGb: Full name: 'Remaining Storage (GB)'. Explanation: Remaining disk or cloud space. Data type: NUMERIC(7,2). Example: 983.5.
archeology|ScanProcessing|StationLink: Full name: 'Total Station Integration'. Explanation: Indicates if total station integration is used. Data type: CHAR(6). Example: 'Yes'.
archeology|ScanProcessing|CamCal: Full name: 'Camera Calibration Status'. Explanation: Whether camera calibration is completed or pending. Data type: TEXT. Example: 'Required'.
archeology|ScanProcessing|LensDist: Full name: 'Lens Distortion Status'. Explanation: Whether lens distortion is corrected or unknown. Data type: VARCHAR(14). Possible categories: Corrected, Unknown.
archeology|ScanProcessing|ColorTune: Full name: 'Color Balance Status'. Explanation: Indicates color adjustment requirement. Data type: CHAR(10). Possible categories: Required, Adjusted.
archeology|ScanProcessing|FlowStage: Full name: 'Processing Stage'. Explanation: Current stage of the processing workflow. Data type: VARCHAR(18). Possible categories: Aligned, Meshed, Final.
archeology|ScanProcessing|FmtVer: Full name: 'Export Format Version'. Explanation: Version tag for exported files. Data type: CHAR(3). Possible categories: 2.3, 2.7, 4.0, 1.1.
archeology|ScanQC|QualRegistry: Full name: 'QC Record ID'. Explanation: Primary key for quality control records. Data type: BIGSERIAL. Example: 9001.
archeology|ScanQC|ArcRef: Full name: 'Project Reference'. Explanation: Points to a project for QC. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Example: 'PR7509'.
archeology|ScanQC|CrewRef: Full name: 'Operator Reference'. Explanation: Identifies the operator associated with QC. Data type: CHAR(8). Example: 'OP4641'.
archeology|ScanQC|AccuCheck: Full name: 'Accuracy Assessment'. Explanation: Indicates if accuracy check was done. Data type: VARCHAR(22). Possible categories: Pending, Completed, Not Required.
archeology|ScanQC|CtrlState: Full name: 'Quality Control Status'. Explanation: State of QC checks. Data type: CHAR(10). Possible categories: Failed, Pending.
archeology|ScanQC|ValiMeth: Full name: 'Validation Method'. Explanation: How the data was validated (automated or manual). Data type: VARCHAR(18). Possible categories: Automated, Visual.
archeology|ScanQC|ValiState: Full name: 'Validation Status'. Explanation: Final status of validation. Data type: TEXT. Possible categories: Rejected, Approved.
archeology|ScanQC|ArchStat: Full name: 'Archival Status'. Explanation: Indicates if data is archived. Data type: VARCHAR(10). Possible categories: Verified, Pending.
archeology|ScanQC|PubStat: Full name: 'Publication Status'. Explanation: Whether data is published, drafted, etc. Data type: VARCHAR(24). Possible categories: Draft, Submitted.
archeology|ScanQC|CopyStat: Full name: 'Copyright Status'. Explanation: Copyright or licensing restriction. Data type: CHAR(10). Possible categories: Reserved, Restricted, Open Access.
archeology|ScanQC|RefMention: Full name: 'Data Citation'. Explanation: Reference or citation code for the data. Data type: VARCHAR(60). Possible categories: Citation-8447, Citation-6197, Citation-8090, Citation-2238.
archeology|ScanQC|Remark: Full name: 'Additional Notes'. Explanation: Any free-text remarks or comments. Data type: TEXT. Example: 'Sell shoulder understand serious degree particular game.'
